import React, { useContext, useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { cart, logoText, user } from "../assets"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartContext from "../context/cartContext"; export const Header = () => { const cartItems = useContext(CartContext); const [cartQty, setCartQty] = useState(cartItems.cartArray); useEffect(() => { setCartQty(cartItems.cartArray.length); }, [cartItems.cartArray]); const toggleMenu = () => { document.getElementById("menu").classList.toggle("hidden"); document .getElementById("menuButton") .children[0].classList.toggle("rotate-45"); document .getElementById("menuButton") .children[1].classList.toggle("opacity-0"); document .getElementById("menuButton") .children[2].classList.toggle("-rotate-45"); // document // .getElementById("menuButton") // .children[2].classList.toggle("-translate-x-6"); }; return (
